page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: There are a wide range of properties in the area.They range from detached houses in their own grounds to flats for single people, both privately owned and council property. These are adverts placed in local papers about properties for sale in July 1985. {Burnopfield.Generous end terraced {property.Spacious accomodation, {centrally heated by gas.Comprises {ent.porch,hall,lounge,dining, { utility,bathroom/w.c.,3 beds.,damp {proofed.Asking price Â£19,500. } Tanfield Village.Ent.hall,fitted kit., lounge/dining,bath/shower,3 beds.,garage and gardens.Full central heating and double glazed throughout. Asking price Â£29,950.
